subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4.5 Release Candidate 1
msgSnippet: ... It works fine with jMock 2. Thanks. --Nat.
messageBody:
2008/8/6 David Saff <david@...>:
> All,
>
> http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15278
>
> is release candidate 1 of JUnit 4.5. We believe that we've addressed
> all bugs found by our intrepid beta testers. (Robin, Nat, we'd love a
> confirmation of that). Please, sometime in the next 48 hours,
> substitute the jar in for your current 4.4 installation, and let us
> know, here or in tracker, of any problems discovered. If no problems
> are found, 4.5 will be live about this time on Friday.

It works fine with jMock 2.

Thanks.
--Nat.
